```{r}
library(lterdatasampler)
library(kableExtra)
library(tidyverse)

```

```{r}
#| fig-cap: "crab size vs latitude"

ggplot(data=pie_crab, aes(x=size, y=latitude)) + geom_point(alpha=0.5) 
   

```

```{r}
table <- pie_crab |> 
  group_by(site) |> 
  summarise(mean = round(mean(size), 2), sd = round(sd(size), 2), sample_size = n())
```
